Package main

Class Stadium

java.lang.Object
main.Stadium
public class Stadium extends Object
The main stadium class; displays the stadium menus from which the player can either play a match against an opposing team or take a bye. Taking a bye also allows the player to select "special training" for a single Athlete, and has a chance of RandomEvents generating. Both of these actions will advance the game state and increment the main environment's week counter.

      Constructor. Generates a series of OpposingTeams based on the number of weeks in the season.
      Parameters:

    • checkIfPlayerTeamInjured

      public boolean checkIfPlayerTeamInjured()
      Checks all Athletes in the player's main team array for injuries.
      Returns:
      'True' if all Athletes in the team are injured, else 'false'.

    • playerWon

      public boolean playerWon(PlayerTeam player, Team winner)
      Checks if player won their match.
      Parameters:
      player - The PlayerTeam that competed in the match.
      winner - The Team that won the match.
      Returns:
      'True' if both Teams passed are the same.

    • playMatch

      public String[] playMatch(PlayerTeam player, int opposition) throws CannotPlayMatchException
      Generates a Match object based on the selected OpposingTeam and calls methods from Match to determine the winner. Player is given rewards if they are victorious and the opponent is removed from the array of available matches.
      Parameters:
      player - The PlayerTeam to compete against the chosen opponent.
      Throws:
      CannotPlayMatchException

    • takeBye

      public void takeBye() throws CannotPlayMatchException
      Increments the week counter without playing a match. Restores all player's Athletes to full HP and has a 1/4 chance to generate and activate a RandomEvent.
      Parameters:
      e - The main game environment.
      player - PlayerTeam to restore HP for.
      Throws:
      CannotPlayMatchException

    • specialTraining

      public String specialTraining(PlayerTeam player, int chosenInteger)
      Presents the player with the option for "special training" when taking a bye. Commencing training will give a selected Athlete a +5 Atk and Def bonus.
      Parameters:
      player - The player's team to select Athletes from.
      chosenInteger - The integer of the athlete in the array to use
